sentences.en: ...alternative health care.
sentences.cn: …替代性保健。

sentences.en: Alternative treatments can provide a useful back-up to conventional treatment.
sentences.cn: 替代疗法能为传统的治疗提供有效的辅助。

sentences.en: An alternative route is along the Via Unione.
sentences.cn: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

sentences.en: For many they clearly represent an alternative to run-of-the-mill estate cars.
sentences.cn: 对于很多人来说，他们显然可以作为一般旅行车的替代品。

sentences.en: He quickly assessed what alternatives were open to him.
sentences.cn: 他迅速估计了一下还有哪些办法可以采用。

sentences.en: I had no alternative but to report him to the police.
sentences.cn: 除了向警方举报他，我别无选择。

sentences.en: I knew from past experience that alternative therapies could help.
sentences.cn: 根据过去的经验，我知道替代疗法可能有用。

sentences.en: I was interested in alternative medicine and becoming an aromatherapist.
sentences.cn: 我对替代疗法非常感兴趣，想做个芳香疗法治疗师。

sentences.en: If payment is not received legal action will be our only alternative .
sentences.cn: 如果收不到付款，我们只能采取法律行动。

sentences.en: If you like alternative comedy you'll love this book.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢另类喜剧的话，你就会喜欢这本书。

sentences.en: In Belgium only qualified doctors may practise alternative medicine.
sentences.cn: 在比利时只有资质合格的医生才能从事非传统医学工作。

sentences.en: Is there an alternative to traction for a broken leg?
sentences.cn: 对于腿部骨折有什么方法替代牵引治疗吗？

sentences.en: Latterly, he has written extensively about alternative medicine.
sentences.cn: 近来，他写了大量有关替代医学的文章。

sentences.en: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
sentences.cn: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: sources of alternative energy
sentences.cn: 替代能源

sentences.en: The book gives you a flavour of what alternative therapy is about.
sentences.cn: 这本书让你大致了解一下什么是替代疗法。

sentences.en: The book tries to steer you through the maze of alternative therapies.
sentences.cn: 本书旨在就各种非传统疗法为您指点迷津。

sentences.en: There is an increasingly popular alternative.
sentences.cn: 有了越来越受欢迎的替代品。

sentences.en: There may be alternative methods of substantiation other than written records.
sentences.cn: 除书面记录外，可能还有其他方法可以证实。

sentences.en: This coheres with Peel's cham-pioning of alternative music.
sentences.cn: 这与皮尔倡导另类音乐的做法一致。

sentences.en: tolerance of alternative lifestyles
sentences.cn: 对另类生活方式的包容

sentences.en: What is alternative health care? What can it do for you?
sentences.cn: 什么是另类医疗？它能为你做些什么？

words.tran_cn: 交替地；轮流地；隔一个地
非此即彼；二者择一地；作为一种选择
供选择的；选择性的；交替的

phrases.tran_cn: 代用燃料；可替代燃料；人造液体燃料
替代，替代物；比较选择方案
交替计划；可供选择的方案
没有别的办法了；没有其他选择
v. 别无选择；只得；唯一的办法是

trans.tran_en: deliberately different from what is usual, expected, or traditional
If one thing is an alternative to another, the first can be found, used, or done instead of the second
